data.lyric:
[ti:Famous Friends]
[ar:Chris Young/Kane Brown]
[al:Famous Friends]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.17]Famous Friends - Chris Young/Kane Brown
[00:01.57]Lyrics by：Chris Young/Cary Barlowe/Corey Crowder
[00:03.42]Composed by：Chris Young/Cary Barlowe/Corey Crowder
[00:05.32]Chris Young：
[00:11.93]My buddy Brandon holds the record
[00:16.57]For single-season touchdown throws
[00:21.16]And good ol' Johnny he's the life of every party
[00:24.99]It's like cheers the know him everywhere he goes
[00:28.60]Chris Young/Kane Brown：
[00:29.46]I've got some famous friends you've probably never heard of
[00:34.23]But back in Rutherford County our crowd is second to none
[00:38.85]You might not know them here in this big city we're in
[00:43.56]But when I go back home I've got some famous friends
[00:48.34]Yeah I do
[00:52.97]Oh-oh oh-oh
[00:56.09]Kane Brown：
[00:58.90]My buddy Jason he's the sheriff
[01:03.52]He'll flash his lights but let me go
[01:07.29]My boy Randy he's a preacher
[01:09.86]My girl Megan she's been teacher of the year
[01:12.99]That's swear for five years in a row
[01:15.83]Chris Young/Kane Brown：
[01:16.75]I've got some famous friends you've probably never heard of
[01:21.27]But back in Hamilton County our crowd is second to none
[01:25.88]You might not know them here in this big city we're in
[01:30.69]But when I go back home I've got some famous friends
[01:35.49]Yeah I do
[01:42.73]Kane Brown/Chris Young：
[01:45.11]I got friends in high places only small town roads
[01:50.47]'Cause 'round here it's all about the people that you know
[01:53.94]Chris Young/Kane Brown：
[01:54.53]I've got some famous friends you probably never heard of
[01:59.09]But back in Davidson County our crowd is second to none
[02:03.76]You might not know them here in this big city we're in
[02:08.39]But when I go back home I've got some famous friends
[02:13.17]Yeah I do
[02:18.03]Yeah I do
[02:22.65]You might not know them here in this big city we're in
[02:27.25]But when I go back home I've got some famous friends yeah
[02:35.21]I've got some famous friends
[02:37.69]I've got some famous friends
[02:41.61]Yeah
data.trans:
[ti:Famous Friends]
[ar:Chris Young/Kane Brown]
[al:Famous Friends]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.17]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.57]//
[00:03.42]//
[00:05.32]//
[00:11.93]我的朋友Brandon是纪录保持者
[00:16.57]单个赛季得分最多
[00:21.16]而老Johnny 他为每一场派对带去活力
[00:24.99]就好像不管他去哪里 大家都会欢呼
[00:28.60]//
[00:29.46]我有一些有名的朋友 你可能根本没听过
[00:34.23]但是在我们卢瑟福县 我们这一群人首屈一指
[00:38.85]在我们所在的这个大城市 你可能并不认识他们
[00:43.56]但当我回到家乡 我就有一些有名的朋友
[00:48.34]真的
[00:52.97]//
[00:56.09]//
[00:58.90]我的朋友Jason 他是警长
[01:03.52]他会亮起警灯 却不为难我
[01:07.29]我的哥们Randy 他是传教士
[01:09.86]我的女友Megan 她是年度最佳教师
[01:12.99]那是连续五年的荣誉称号
[01:15.83]//
[01:16.75]我有一些有名的朋友 你可能根本没听过
[01:21.27]但是在我们哈密尔顿县 我们这一群人首屈一指
[01:25.88]在我们所在的这个大城市 你可能并不认识他们
[01:30.69]但当我回到家乡 我就有一些有名的朋友
[01:35.49]真的
[01:42.73]//
[01:45.11]我有一些身居高位的朋友 走在小城道路上
[01:50.47]因为在这个小地方 大家都是认识的
[01:53.94]//
[01:54.53]我有一些有名的朋友 你可能根本没听过
[01:59.09]但是在我们戴维森县 我们这一群人首屈一指
[02:03.76]在我们所在的这个大城市 你可能并不认识他们
[02:08.39]但当我回到家乡 我就有一些有名的朋友
[02:13.17]真的
[02:18.03]真的
[02:22.65]在我们所在的这个大城市 你可能并不认识他们
[02:27.25]但当我回到家乡 我就有一些有名的朋友
[02:35.21]我有一些有名的朋友
[02:37.69]我有一些有名的朋友
[02:41.61]//
